text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a _SubjectPhysicalPosition

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _SubjectPhysicalPositionsubject physical positionThe spatial relationship of a subject whether human, other animal, or plant, to a frame of reference such as gravity or a collection device.

name: ActClassSubjectPhysicalPosition
title: ActClassSubjectPhysicalPosition
description: The spatial relationship of a subject whether human, other animal, or plant, to a frame of reference such as gravity or a collection device.
